name: FlexiImageView
tagline: FlexiImageView is a powerful extension of Android's default ImageView.
body:
What is it?
==============

FlexiImageView is a powerful extension of Android's default ImageView.

Features
========

Coming soon.


Developed By
============

Saravan Pantham - saravan.pantham@gmail.com
